nodes.text: Novian ore was a type of ore that could be found on the planet Safrifa. During the High Republic Era, the Tholothian mercenary Ty Yorrick accepted a payment of novian from a marsh-lord on the world after rescuing the dignitary's son. Yorrick planned to have the ore melted down into saw blades by an armorer on Keldooine, though she later extended her stay on Safrifa after a group of locals offered their own novian ore in exchange for the Yorrick's monster-hunting services.
